issue.title: [CF 673] Conditional for equipped set name
issue.body:
I'd like a way to use the name of the currently equipped wow equipment set in a conditional statement.  For example I change to my tank spec but haven't yet swapped to my tank gear set and an icon lights up indicating this.


> Posted by CurseForge user mstrjonathan | Imported from CurseForge issue #673 | Raw

comments.body:
Added in r633


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
